campaign.share_campaign_desc: A single share from you will usually lead to at least one donation. Sharing this campaign only takes 10 seconds.
campaign.print_desc: Or print out this flyer and help spread the word
campaign.no_data_tab: There's no update on this campaign yet. Join as a donor and request for an update!
campaign.donation_givers_desc: <bold>+ {{lenght}} givers</bold> have donated to this campaign
footer.support_title: GIVE.asia has been recognised and part of:
footer.quote_text: It's not how much we give but how much love we put into giving.
footer.copyright: All content Copyright © 2021, Givola Pte Ltd. All Rights Reserved
footer.tagline_2: Donate Online to help people in need
footer.tagline_3: Create a fundraising campaign in seconds
footer.tagline_4: Raise fund for charities & non-profit organizations
footer.top_desc_desc_1: Founded in 2009, GIVE.asia is Asia’s leading free fundraising platform for fundraisers to raise money for their causes. We have helped more than 15,000 campaigns across APAC, raising more than SGD$75 million.
footer.top_desc_desc_2: GIVE.asia is Social Enterprise member of RAISE a platform for businesses that achieve social impact alongside sustainable financial return.
footer.top_desc_desc_3: Do let us know and we'll reach out to the person in need on your behalf to help.
